original_text: In that thou lovest thine enemies, and hatest thy friends. For thou hast declared this day, that thou regardest neither princes nor servants: for this day I perceive, that if Absalom had lived, and all we had died this day, then it had pleased thee well.
korean_text: 이는 왕께서 미워하는 자는 사랑하시며 사랑하는 자는 미워하시고 오늘 지휘관들과 부하들을 멸시하심을 나타내심이라 오늘 내가 깨달으니 만일 압살롬이 살고 오늘 우리가 다 죽었더면 왕이 마땅히 여기실 뻔하였나이다

sentences.original_text: In that thou lovest thine enemies
For thou hast declared this day
that thou regardest neither princes nor servants
and all we had died this day
then it had pleased thee well
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 너를 크게 기쁘게 했을 것이다
